on_buy_success:
You now own {item}!
 It costs {upgradeCost} doubloonss to upgrade this item!
Yarr Harr! Here's my trusty {item}. Only {upgradeCost} doubloons to make it better!
on_buy_expensive:
Arrrr!! You don't have enough doubloons for this item!
You need {cost} doubloons!
on_buy_owned: Yo ho ho! You already own this item sailor! Try and buy something else...
on_sell_success: Sold! You parted with {item} in exchange for {cost} doubloons!
Yarr Harr! Thanks for the {item}. Here's {cost} doubloons
on_all_emails_read: Blimey! You've read all your emails!
Raise the jolly roger, you have no emails to read!
on_one_unread: Arrr, you have one email to read!
Aye me hearty! You have one email left to read!
on_multiple_unread: Arrr, you have {unread emails count} unread emails!
Aye me hearty! You have {unread emails count} email left to read!
